column5: Hi guys, I just joined this forum a few days ago after lurking around for a while, thought I'd introduce myself. I do alot of river fishing, fly/spey fishing and bass fishing. I have been getting into rod building in the past year and a half under the guidance of another member of this forum, you guys know him as Kemper. Anyways, I just wanted to say hi and post a few pics:       A pic of my most recent build, a spey to float conversion:    In action:
Welcome!! Nice setup, fish, and hat!!!     You can get a lot of great info here!      Ignore the crazies  CHEERS
Hey buddy, does that fish come in mens?  Seriously though, Josh is a real-life giant. Those fish are twice the size they appear.  Welcome aboard.

Welcome! Real nice build too, some pretty awesome woodwork there. What I like best about it is you put the reel seat where it's supposed to be. So many guys run their reels higher up on their handles these days and I just don't get it.
great pictures! welcome abord Im getting into spey fishing, I may have a few questions about it if you care to share some knowledge!
Thanks for joining and being part of this community. Looks like you got some nice places/talent to fish from the size of them puppies.   Art
Welcome Josh  Saw the pics of the build on FB and was impressed   Might be tempted to do an 8wt Rainshadow spey conversion for myself.
Welcome aboards man!  I look forward to some more reports from you.
welcome aboard  as well,nice pics and nice rod work!!!!!!!!!!!
Welcome Aboard Dude !  You'll fit in great here--They love pictures  ID1
Im one of the cazys. Welcome to the show.. Nice pictures and that bass SWEET.. Looks like you will fit in good here.
Welcome aboard Josh. I'm another one of those CraZ-eeez.
Thanks guys, I look forward to making new posts!
